note:
Associate Professor of English, interested in Shakespeare, early modern drama, rhetoric of economics, performance and, most broadly, how theater and literature help us conceptualize social and economic systems. 

Profile image: head shot of middle-aged white guy, shaggy brown hair, wearing black sweater over collared shirt. 

Header image: indistinct roads and buildings of a sprawling desert city seen from a mountain, sparse shrubbery in foreground, cloud-streaked sky in background.
